GvG (Group vs. Group)
%% Tournament Group vs Group to move your group in the cave on the other%% random group nominating. The main objective of both%% groups - to collect a greater number of points than the opponent team.%% Designed for groups of 6 or more participants.%% The group leader must submit an application during the registration period.%% To register in the opening event, you can use the link (Event must be active): Sign up for Event%%
